known_issues: Bug: In Folders feature, the first folder created by a user cannot be deleted (and ensure deletion works for all subsequent folders too).
Bug: In Missions feature, the first mission created by a user cannot be deleted (and ensure deletion works for all subsequent missions too).
Bug/UI: When opening a link sent from Gallery to a Mission, closing the link shows an 'unable to open link' message; this should not appear.

existing_features.title: Fix the Folders delete flow so the first folder a user creates (folder id 0) can be deleted, and ensure deletion works for all subsequent folders as well.

Fix the Missions delete flow so the first mission a user creates (mission id 0) can be deleted, and ensure deletion works for all subsequent missions as well (from both the missions list and mission detail views if applicable).

When opening a link attachment inside a Mission (a link that was sent/moved from the Gallery to a Mission), do not show the 'Unable to Open Link' fallback message after the user closes/returns from the link if the link actually opened successfully.

projectName: Fix deletion bugs for first folder/mission and prevent erroneous 'Unable to Open Link' after opening mission links
